title: The Doorway: Night Stalkers
description: In the first book Wendy is stung by a giant scorpion. Now Brainy and Thumper must find some rare berries in order to save her life.Brainy has to carry the unconscious Wendy, but due to his super strength that is no problem. When they find the place where the berries are supposed to be they only find a single one. It helps, but Wendy remains unconscious. To find enough berries to save her life they must go into the city of Shendai. But the city is inhabited by a nocturnal group known as Night Stalkers. The Night Stalkers, for the most part, are a feral people known for their hunger for flesh.Brainy and Thumper know that they must put their own lives in danger to save their friend.
author: Gary M.   Martin
